(2) Getting APIs to Work



What is API Sprawl?

What is API Sprawl? Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(4) Sprawl



What is API Sprawl? Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(5) API Sprawl

  • IT capabilities and IT landscapes are growing in size and complexity
  • Modern IT management approaches move away from centralization
  • Centralized IT reacts slower to business needs but is easier to manage
  • Decentralized IT reacts faster to business needs but is more complex


What is API Sprawl? Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(6) Internal Sprawl

  • Most API sprawl happens inside organizations
  • Lack of strategy, guidance, support, and enablement
  • Most organizations have no insight into their API landscape
  • Reduced effectiveness and increased cost


What is API Sprawl? Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(7) External Sprawl

  • Some organizations have confusing API offerings
  • Lack of product perspective and management
  • Inside-out often results in too many and confusing APIs
  • Outside-in helps a lot with improving API products


What is API Sprawl? Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(8) Indicators of API Sprawl

  • No catalog, directory, portal, or marketplace
  • APIs are reflecting the system architecture
  • Many/most APIs have one consumer
  • No clear business alignment of APIs
  • APIs are a side-effect of implementation rather than a goal


The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation

Outline (The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation)

  1. What is API Sprawl? [5]
  2. The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation [3]
  3. The Bad: Unmanaged Growth [4]
  4. The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety [5]
  5. Conclusions [2]
The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(10) The Good

  • APIs are necessary (but not sufficient) for digital transformation
  • Organizations typically have more APIs than they think they do
  • The digital footprint of organizations will continue to grow
  • Improving API ROI is a smart long-term strategy
  • There's a rise of API-related roles
    • API Product Managers for the success of API products
    • API Program Managers for the success of the overall API portfolio


The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(11) Finding Digital Building Blocks



The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(12) Using Digital Building Blocks



The Bad: Unmanaged Growth

Outline (The Bad: Unmanaged Growth)

  1. What is API Sprawl? [5]
  2. The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation [3]
  3. The Bad: Unmanaged Growth [4]
  4. The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety [5]
  5. Conclusions [2]
The Bad: Unmanaged Growth Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(14) The Bad

  • Unstructured IT makes changes costly and risky
  • Most organizations need to transition to faster flow
  • APIs create risks that must be properly managed


The Bad: Unmanaged Growth Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(15) Shadow and Zombie APIs

  • Shadow APIs are unmanaged APIs
    • Created unintentionally
    • Created without being seen as a proper API
  • Zombie APIs are unused/unknown APIs
    • APIs that nobody remembered to shut down
    • APIs that nobody ever needed but that got enabled


The Bad: Unmanaged Growth Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(16) Old Product Thinking



The Bad: Unmanaged Growth Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(17) New Product Thinking



The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety

Outline (The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety)

  1. What is API Sprawl? [5]
  2. The Good: APIs Drive Digital Transformation [3]
  3. The Bad: Unmanaged Growth [4]
  4. The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety [5]
  5. Conclusions [2]
The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(19) The Ugly

  • Just Doing APIs isn't good enough
  • APIs are a strategic asset and need to be managed accordingly
  • Establishing API programs is becoming the new normal for larger organizations


The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(20) Engineering the Engineers



The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(21) Business Capability Map



The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(22) Start Small

  • Identify potential for demonstrating the value of APIs
  • Cleaning up years of API neglect will take a long time
  • Demonstrating business value helps with buy-in and funding


The Ugly: Balancing Speed and Safety Erik Wilde (@dret): API Sprawl: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

(23) Design for Scale

  • Plan for diversity, decentralization, and dynamic growth
  • APIs are not going to transform an organization
  • It's going to be a long on-ramp and there's no off-ramp

(25) API Strategy Matters

  • We probably should do something about our APIsâ¦

  • Bottom-up: Demonstrating value and pointing out economies of scale
